description:
Warm and cozy 1 bedroom in the heart of soho! Extremely clean and well furnished, kitchen, 50 inch tv, brick walls, high ceilings, dark wood floors and new bathroom, all you could ask for while enjoying soho! Walking distance to some of the best restaurants, shopping, bars and clubs in nyc. Across the street from the James hotel and David Burke kitchen. Steps away from A,C,N,R,F,B and D trains! Walking distance to TriBeCa, LES and battery park

Heart of the famed Soho area!
name: Charming soho apt in prime location
review: Michael's apartment was the perfect place for our mother/daughter NYC trip. Neighborhood was convenient and cool. We would definitely stay here again.
